description: After using the spell that removes just the alcohol from an alcoholic drink, Frieren, Himmel, and Eisen taste the drink and can`t tell the difference. They then urge Heiter to try the drink, but he immediately guesses that the drink isn`t alcoholic, to which the party all call him a Corrupt Priest.

titles.title: Magic Episode 2: Magic to Just Remove Alcohol from Booze
Marumaru no Mahou Dai 2 Kai: Osake kara Alcohol dake o Nuku Mahou
●●の魔法 第2回: お酒からアルコールだけを抜く魔法
